meanings.sent1: The breeze rustled the leaves softly.
meanings.sent2: I love the feeling of a cool breeze on a hot day.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous breeze played with my hat, trying to steal it.
meanings.sent4: As the breeze whispered through the trees, it carried secrets of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The gentle breeze felt like a comforting hug from nature.

meanings.sent1: She breezed through the exam without any difficulty.
meanings.sent2: The experienced hiker can breeze up the mountain in no time.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to breeze past the dog, but got caught in the act.
meanings.sent4: He breezed into the room, full of confidence and charm.
meanings.sent5: The skilled dancer breezed across the stage with grace and ease.

meanings.sent1: With his talent, he can breeze through any task given to him.
meanings.sent2: She breezed through the presentation effortlessly, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent3: The chef managed to breeze through the complex recipe in no time.
meanings.sent4: He breezed past his competitors in the race, finishing first.
meanings.sent5: The student breezed through the math problems, solving them quickly.
